title: Handle a Product Recall
description: A manufacturer has issued a safety recall for a product. The company needs to notify all customers who purchased it.

tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has the correct product identifier.

tasks.description: Generate a list of all customers who have ever purchased the recalled product.
tasks.expected_outcome: System generates a list of all affected customers and their contact information.

tasks.description: Send an urgent email to all affected customers with details about the recall and instructions on how to return the product for a full refund.
tasks.expected_outcome: System successfully sends the recall notification emails.
